description: QAOA MaxCut on 4-cycle subgraphs of Tuna-9 (12-edge topology). First non-tree graphs testable on this hardware.

circuits.cycle_a_p2:
version 3.0
qubit[9] q
bit[9] b

// QAOA MaxCut p=2: 4-cycle q4-q6-q8-q7
// Layer 1: gamma1=0.3, beta1=0.7
// Layer 2: gamma2=0.8, beta2=0.3
// Edges: (4,6), (6,8), (7,8), (4,7)
// Classical max cut = 4

// 1. Initial superposition
H q[4]
H q[6]
H q[7]
H q[8]

// ====== LAYER 1 ======
// Cost unitary: ZZ(gamma1) for each edge
CNOT q[4], q[6]
Rz(-0.300000) q[6]
CNOT q[4], q[6]

CNOT q[6], q[8]
Rz(-0.300000) q[8]
CNOT q[6], q[8]

CNOT q[7], q[8]
Rz(-0.300000) q[8]
CNOT q[7], q[8]

CNOT q[4], q[7]
Rz(-0.300000) q[7]
CNOT q[4], q[7]

// Mixer unitary: Rx(2*beta1) on each qubit
Rx(1.400000) q[4]
Rx(1.400000) q[6]
Rx(1.400000) q[7]
Rx(1.400000) q[8]

// ====== LAYER 2 ======
// Cost unitary: ZZ(gamma2) for each edge
CNOT q[4], q[6]
Rz(-0.800000) q[6]
CNOT q[4], q[6]

CNOT q[6], q[8]
Rz(-0.800000) q[8]
CNOT q[6], q[8]

CNOT q[7], q[8]
Rz(-0.800000) q[8]
CNOT q[7], q[8]

CNOT q[4], q[7]
Rz(-0.800000) q[7]
CNOT q[4], q[7]

// Mixer unitary: Rx(2*beta2) on each qubit
Rx(0.600000) q[4]
Rx(0.600000) q[6]
Rx(0.600000) q[7]
Rx(0.600000) q[8]

// Measure
b = measure q
